import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import {Facebook, Instagram, Linkedin, Twitter } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { useNavigate , useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; function Footer() { const router = useNavigate() const {pathname} = useLocation() console.log(pathname) useEffect(()=>{ if(pathname == '/contacts' || pathname == "/" ){ document.getElementById('footsec').style.display="none"; } else{ document.getElementById('footsec').style.display="block"; } },[pathname]) return (

No: 111 , 3rd main road , alvarth
{/*
{router('/contacts')}} >

Lets Talk

To

Team Patch Work

teampatchworkps@gmail.com

Instagram

Twitter

Facebook

Linked in

{router('/')}}>HOME
{router('/about')}}>ABOUT US
{router('/works')}}>WORKS
{router('/service')}}>OUR SERVICE
{router('/contacts')}}>CONTACT US
*/} {/*

TEAM PATCH WORK TEAM PATCH WORK

*/}
); } export default Footer;
